Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: Molecular Characterization of Germ Cell Tumors
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: Molecular Characterization of Germ Cell Tumors
Configuration.Description: We performed comprehensive molecular profiling of germ cell tumors, including whole exome sequencing and transcriptome sequencing, derived from patient samples. This project additionally explores mechanisms of chemosensivity in these patients, as well as mechanisms of tumor evolution in the context of treatment.
Configuration.StudyInEx:
Inclusion:

Germ cell tumor

Availability of tumor and germline samples
